Rate this place
Type your name
Tap GPS button to get your actual location
Use search bar to find a specific location
Tap toggle button to switch between map and list modes
Use the progress bar to filter out cafes with lower rating
Use the map to navigate. Click on the marker to get detailed information about the cafe.
Cafes are sorted by the distance from the current location
Click on the cafe to get detailed information
Cafe name
Cafe address
Click on the number or phone icon to dial
Click on the URL or icon to open the site
Check the price rating among users
Check the overall service rating
Type your name to submit new rating
Submit your own rating. It will be saved locally
